import{accountFormatter,accountOverviewCardVarient,currencySymbolGenerator}from'utilities/Generator';import AccountCardWrapper from'./AccountCard.style';/*
* ==================== AccountCard 組件說明 ====================
* 帳戶總覽組件
* ==================== AccountCard 可傳參數 ====================
* 1. type -> 帳戶科目別 (ex: "004")
* 2. cardName -> 卡片名稱
* 3. accountNo -> 卡片帳號
* 4. balance -> 卡片餘額，輸入純數字即可，顯示時會自動加上貨幣符號及千分位逗點
* 5. color -> 卡片顏色，預設紫色
* 6. hasShadow -> 顯示影子，預設無
* 7. dollarSign -> 貨幣符號，預設為 '$'
* 8. percent -> 百分比（0~100，不含符號）
* 9. annotation -> 金額旁的備註，如：以使用額度
* 10.ariaLabel -> title for button，預設為 cardName
* 11.children
* 12. isShowAccoutNo -> boolean。是否顯示帳號，預設為true
* */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AccountCard=function AccountCard(_ref){var _ref$type=_ref.type,type=_ref$type===void 0?'M':_ref$type,cardName=_ref.cardName,accountNo=_ref.accountNo,balance=_ref.balance,color=_ref.color,_ref$hasShadow=_ref.hasShadow,hasShadow=_ref$hasShadow===void 0?false:_ref$hasShadow,_ref$dollarSign=_ref.dollarSign,dollarSign=_ref$dollarSign===void 0?'NTD':_ref$dollarSign,percent=_ref.percent,annotation=_ref.annotation,ariaLabel=_ref.ariaLabel,children=_ref.children,_ref$isShowAccoutNo=_ref.isShowAccoutNo,isShowAccoutNo=_ref$isShowAccoutNo===void 0?true:_ref$isShowAccoutNo;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccountCardWrapper,{title:ariaLabel||cardName,$cardColor:color||accountOverviewCardVarient(type).color,$hasShadow:hasShadow,children:children!==null&&children!==void 0?children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:cardName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[percent,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{visibility:isShowAccoutNo&&!!accountNo?'visible':'hidden'},children:accountFormatter(accountNo)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"justify-between items-end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:annotation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"balance ".concat(currencySymbolGenerator(dollarSign,Math.abs(balance)).length>12&&'small'),children:"".concat(currencySymbolGenerator(dollarSign,Math.abs(balance)).replace('.00',''))})]})]})});};export default AccountCard;

import { accountFormatter, accountOverviewCardVarient, currencySymbolGenerator, } from 'utilities/Generator'; import AccountCardWrapper from './AccountCard.style'; /* * ==================== AccountCard 組件說明 ==================== * 帳戶總覽組件 * ==================== AccountCard 可傳參數 ==================== * 1. type -> 帳戶科目別 (ex: "004") * 2. cardName -> 卡片名稱 * 3. accountNo -> 卡片帳號 * 4. balance -> 卡片餘額，輸入純數字即可，顯示時會自動加上貨幣符號及千分位逗點 * 5. color -> 卡片顏色，預設紫色 * 6. hasShadow -> 顯示影子，預設無 * 7. dollarSign -> 貨幣符號，預設為 '$' * 8. percent -> 百分比（0~100，不含符號） * 9. annotation -> 金額旁的備註，如：以使用額度 * 10.ariaLabel -> title for button，預設為 cardName * 11.children * 12. isShowAccoutNo -> boolean。是否顯示帳號，預設為true * */ const AccountCard = ({ type = 'M', cardName, accountNo, balance, color, hasShadow = false, dollarSign = 'NTD', percent, annotation, ariaLabel, children, isShowAccoutNo = true, }) => ( { children ?? ( <>
{cardName}
{percent} %
{accountFormatter(accountNo)}
{annotation}
12 && 'small'}`}> {`${currencySymbolGenerator(dollarSign, Math.abs(balance)).replace('.00', '')}`}
) } ); export default AccountCard;
